title: TIL; Don't play LoL past 7PM.
body: It's when the garbage kids come out to play.

replies.body: How kind of you to warn us of changes in your gameplay schedule.
It's only getting worse I noticed. I'm enjoying writing about the inhabitants of the game more than playing it.

Prime time for gaming has always been around 9PM, when the school kids and tired workers climb onto their computer for a few matching before going to bed.

But really though, toxicity wise it's about the same level throughout the whole day, you just get different types depending on what time you're playing at.

There's always that someone who would ruin your game, doesn't matter what time of the day they usually play. Been playing some morning and afternoon games, all same to me. Its rare to have a good game by yourself anymore cause of shittalkers and ragers.

So my advice to you would probably find a group you can play with. That way you can have more fun playing :)
Shouldn't those kids be in bed though :(?
